qas.question: Where does Bond go after his suspension?
What group did Sciarra belong to?
Who is the head of Spectre?
Where does Sciarra's funeral take place?
Who is the leader of Spectre?
What is the name of the Spectre assassin who tracks Bond?
Which member of Spectre had been presumed to be dead?
Who disobeys Q's orders and travels to Rome?
Whose wife belonged to a criminal organization?
Who is pursued by Mr. Oberhauser, a Spectre assasin?
Who is a current member of Quantum?

context: <b9_0>Bond<b9_0/> disobeys M's order and travels to <a0_0><a5_0>Rome<a5_0/><a0_0/> to attend Sciarra's funeral. That evening he visits Sciarra's widow <b10_0>Lucia<b10_0/>, who tells him about <a1_0>Spectre<a1_0/>, a criminal organisation to which her husband belonged. Bond infiltrates a Spectre meeting, where he identifies the leader, <a2_0><a6_0><a8_0>Franz Oberhauser<a8_0/><a6_0/><a2_0/>. When Oberhauser addresses <b11_0>Bond<b11_0/> by name, he escapes and is pursued by <a7_0>Mr. Hinx<a7_0/>, a Spectre <a3_0>assassin<a3_0/>. <a4_0>Moneypenny<a4_0/> informs Bond that the information he collected leads to <b12_0>Mr. White<b12_0/>, former member of Quantum, a subsidiary of Spectre. Bond asks her to investigate Oberhauser, who was presumed dead years earlier.
